samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the overview of basic ImageEditor features such as crop, rotate, flip, insert a shapes and text features.

samples.name: Profile Picture
samples.description: This sample demonstrates to set the image as profile picture by editing the image like rotating and cropping the image.

samples.name: Custom Toolbar
samples.description: This sample demonstrates to set the image as profile picture by editing the image like rotating and cropping the image.

samples.name: File Restriction
samples.description: The Image Editor component enables file upload restrictions by size and extensions, customizable via numeric inputs and a multi-select dropdown.
